column2: segyeingweonseoneon
inryuyi jeonce seongweonyi goyun joneomgwa pyeongdeunggwa byeonhaji anhneun gweonrireul seunginhami segyeyi jayu, jeongyihago hwapyeongyi gicoida,

ingweoneul musihamgwa moyoghami yamaneun geugageuro doeyeossgo, i geugagdeuli inryuyi yangsimeul oyeom hayeossgo, jeonce saram modu yeonseolgwa sinangjayuga issgo gongguhago bingoni eobsneun segye omi botongeun inminyi gajang nopeun soweoneuro balpyobadyeossda,
saramdeuli pogryeoggwa eogabeuro banbyeoneuro ggeutyi sudaneul haji anheureo, beobciro eongweoneul bohohaneun pilyohami issneunda,
modeun narayi joheun gwangyeyi gaebaleul cogjinhaneun pilyohami issneunda,

ryeonhabgugyi modeun hoeweongugyi inmini ryeonhabgugheonjangeseo giboningweon, saramyi joneomgwa gacihago namnyeopyeongdeunggweone sinnyeomeul jungsinhayeossgo, keun jayueseo sahoejinbohago salneun supyeongyi gaeseon hameul cogjinhagiro gyeolsimhayeossda,
modeun hoeweongugi ryeonhabguggwa hyeobryeoghameuro inweongwa gibonjayue bopyeonjonjunggwa junhaengeul cogjinhameul maengsehayeossda,
i gweonrideulgwa jayudeuleul bopyeoneuro aleumi i maengsereul cungbuneuro silhyeoneume keun jungyoseongi issneunda,
ie jigeum,
ryeonhabgugdaehoe,

modeun saramgwa modeun naraga noryeogeuro silhyeonneun gongdongpyojuneul hago, modeun saramgwa sahoegiguga neul i seoneoneul gieoghago, noryeogeuro gyohoehago gyoyugeuro gweonrihago jayue jonjungeul jogjinhago, narayihago gugjeyi jeomjinhaneun josiro, i gweonrideulgwa jayudeule modeun hoeweongug jasinyi inmingwa gwanhalhabadneun ddangyi inminegeseo bobyeongwa hyogwai issneun seungingwa junhaengeul eodge haneuro, i segyeingweonseoneoneul bal pohaneunda,
ceosjjae
saramdeuli i segyero odaga modu jayuhago, joneomgwa gweonrii pyeongdongeuro issneunda, geudeul riseonggwa yangsimi issnungo, hyeongjeyi jeongsineuro sanghoro ciryoha so.
duljjae

saramdeuli modu i seoneoneseo sseun jeonce gweonrihago jayuga issneun jagyeogi issneunda. jongjog, busaeg, seongbyeol, mal, jonggyo, jeongci ddoneun dareun gyeonhae, gugjeog ddolneun sahoeculsin, sogseong, culsaeng ddoneun dareun caiga issji malara.

saramyi nara ddoneun ddangyi jeongciyi, haengjeongyi ddoneun gugjeyi jiwiyi cairo caiga issji malara, amuri i ddang dogribryeongto, taggwanryeongto, bijaciryeongto ddoneun dareun modeun jugweonhanjega issneunda.
sesjjae
saramdeuli modu saengmyeong, jayuhago insinanjeoni issneun gweonriga issneunda.
nesjjae
saramdeuli kulriddoneun noyeeul haji malara, modeun hyeongsigyi noyejedohago noyemuyeogeul geumjihaso.
daseosjjae
saramdeuli hoghyeong, janhoghan, biindon ddoneun moyoghaneun ciryo ddoneun hyeongbeoleul badji malara.
yeoseosjjae
saramdeuli modeun goseseo beobeuro ingyeogeul seunginbadneun gweonriga issneunda.
ilgobjjae

saramdeuli beobeuro pyeongdeunghago, beobyi pyeongdeunghaneun bohoreul badgo, modeun cabyeoleul badanhneungweonriga issneunda, i seoneoneul wibanhaneun modeun cabyeolgwa i cabyeoleul seondonghaneun haengdongyi wiheomeul piro saramdeuli pyeongdeunghaneun bohoreul badneun gweonriga issneunda.
yeodeolbjjae
heonbeob ddoneun beobeuro badneun gibongweonriga cimhaebadda, sarami gongindoen narabeobweoneseo i cimhaero hyogwaga issneun guje sudaneul eodneun gweonriga issneunda.
ahobjjae
sarameul imyiro cepo, gugeum ddoneun cubanghaji malara.
yeoljjae

geuyi gweonrihago yimureul hwaginhago geuege oneun modeun hyeongsa gobaleul simpanharo modeun sarami wanjeondongdeunghan dogribeun pyeonaega eobsneun beobweoneseo geunyanggwa yeolgi jaepaneul badneun gweonriga issneunda.
yeolhanjjae
hyeongsa gobaleul badneunsaramigug bangyi modeun bojeungi issneun yeolgi simpaneseo babeuro joega isseumeul ibjeungji anheumyeon joega eobseumeul saenggagbadneun gweonriga issneunda.

modeun saramyi modeun haengdong ddoneun buhaengdong, oneun siganeseo narabeob ddoneun gugjebeobeuro modu hyeongsa beomjoe animyeon, hyeongsa beomjoega isseumeul simpanhaji mal ara. hyeongbeol i beomjoehanunsiganeseo sayonghaneun beobryuleul cogwahaji mal ara.
yeol duljjae

saramyi sasaenghwal, jib, jugeoyonggwa tongsineul imyiro ganseobhaji malara. myeongseonggwa pyeongpaneul gonggyeoghaji malara. i ganseob ddoneun gonggyeogeul piryeo, saramdeuleun beobe bohobadneun gweonriga issneunda.
yeol sesjjae
modeun saram modeun naraeseo jayuhan ijuhago jeongcaghaneun gweonriga issneunda.
saram geu jasinyi naraga issneun modu narabuteo ddeonago jasinyi narae ganeun gweonriga issneunda.
yeol nesjjae
saramdeuli baghaereul pihareo oegugeseo mangmyeongeul tamsaeghago badneun gweonriga issneunda.
jeongmal bijeongcijeogyi beomjoe ddoneun ryeonhabgugyi mogjeoggwa weoncigeul wibanhan haengdongeuro gisobadmyeon i gweonrireul sseuji mal ara.
yeol daseos jjae
saramdeuli modu gugjeogi issneun gweonriga issneunda.
saramyi gugjeogeul imyiro bagtalhaji malgo gugjeogeul byeonhaneun gweonrieul buinhaji mal ara.
yeol yeoseosjjae
seongsughan namnyeoga jongjog, gugje ddoneun jonggyoyi hanjega eobsgo gihongwa gajogeul seoljeonghaneun gweonriga issneunda.
namnyeoyangmyeoni jayuhago wanjeoneuro dongyihaaya gyeolhonhanda.
gajogi jayeoneungwa giboneun sahoedanwiga igo sahoehago narae bohobadso.
yeol ilgobjjae
saramdeuli modu jasinyi jaesansoyugweoni issgo, namdeulgwa gongyuhaneun soyurweoni issneunda.
imyiro saramyi jaesaneul bagtalhaji mal ara.
yeol yeodeolbjjae

saramdeuli modu sasang, yangsimgwa jonggyojayuyi gweonriga issneunda. i gweonrieseo geuyi jonggyo ddoneun sinangeul byeonhaneun jayuga issgo, honjaro ddoneun jibdaneuro, gonggaero ddoneun eunmilhi gyori yeonseub, yebaehago gyemyeongeuro geuyi jonggyo ddoneun sinangeul daepyohaneun jayuga issneunda.
yeol ahobjjae

saramdeuli modu yigyeoneul jujanggwa balpyohaneun jayuga issneun gweonriga issneunda. i gweonrieseo jujangi issgo ganseobbadji anhneun jayuga, issgo modeun maegaero guggyereul musihayeoseo sosiggwa sasangeul tamsaeg, suraggwa habgyeoghaneun jayuga issneunda.
seumujjae
saramdeuli modu pyeonghwaro jibhoehago hyeobhoehaneun jayuga issneun gweonriga issneunda.
modeun sarami gangjero danceeseo issji mal ara.
seumu ceosjjae
modeun sarami jigjeobeuro ddoneun jayuro goreun daepyoro jasinyi narareul gwanrihameul camyeohaneun gweonriga issneunda.
modeun sarami pyeongdeungeun gihoero jasinyi narayi gongmureul camyeohanun gweonriga issneunda

inminyi wil jeongbugweonryeogyi gi joida. i wil jeonggiyihago jeongmaleun seongeoro pyohyeonhaso seongeoga gongtongeungwa pyeongdeungeun yigyeolgweoneuro bimil tupyo ddoneun biseushan jayun tupyo jeolcaro oso.
seumu duljjae

sarami sahoeyi seongweoneuroseo saoebohoreul badneun gweonriga issgo, geuyi gaeinjoneomgwa gaeseongyi jayun gaebali yoguhaneun gyeongje, sahoehago munhwayi modeun gweonriyi silhyeoneul badneun gweonriga issgo narayi noryeoggwa gugje hyeobryeogeuro, modeun narayi jojiggwa jaweon sanghwange silhyeonhaneunda.
seumu sesjjae
saramdeuli modu ilhaneun, jayuro jigeobeul goreuneun, geunyanggwa jeoghabhan geunmu jogeoneul badneun, sileobeul pihaneun bohoreul badneun gweonriga issneunda.
saramdeuli modu gateun geunmuro gateun imgeumeul badgo modeun cabyeoleul pihaneun gweonriga issneunda.

ilhaneunsarami jasingwa gajogi saramyi joneome majcweon saenghwal jogeoni isseureo geunyanggwa jeoghabhan imgeumeul badnun gweonriga issneunda. pilyoga isseumyeon dareun yangsigyi sahoebohoreul badso.
jasinyi ijareul bohohareo, saramdeuli modu gonghoereul jojighaneun gweonrihago gonghoee deulneun gweonriga issneunda.
seumu nesjjae
saramdeuli modu swineungwa yeoga sigani issneun gweonriga issneunda. i gweonrieseo ilhaneun sigani habrin handoga issgo, gyucigjeogeuro imgeumeul badaseo swihaneun gweonriga issneunda.
seumu daseosjjae

saramdeuli jasingwa gajogyi geonganggwa bogjireul yujihaneun pilyon saenghwal sujuneul badneun gweonriga issgo, eumsig, os, jib, yiryohago pilyon sahoebugmuga issneunda, sileob, alheum, byeongsin, sabyeol, nohwa ddoneun gita tongjehaji moshaneun ileuro saenggyereul ilheumyeon, bohoreul badneun gweonriga issneunda.
eomeonihago ai teugbyeoleun jogohago jiweoneul badneun gweonriga issneunda. aideul, amuri honsaeng ddoneun bihonsaeng, modu pyeongdeungeun sahoebohoreul badso.
seumu yeoseosjjae

saramdeuli modu gyoyugeul badneun gweonriga issneunda. gyoyugi coesohan cosimgwa gibondangyeeseo musangiso. codeunggyoyugi yimuiso. gisul gwa jigeobgyoyugeul keugero seoljeonghaso. daehaggyoyugeul jeomsuro modeun saramege pyeongdeungeuro yeolso.

gyoyugyi mogjeogi saramyi gaeseongeul jeoncero gaebalhamgwa ingweongwa gibonjayue jonjungeul ganghwahami ida. gyoyugi modeun nara, modeun jongjog ddoneun modeun jonggyo danceyi ihae. gongcahago ujeongeul cogjinhago, ryeonhabgugi pyeonghwareul bohohaneun modeun hwaldongeul cogjinhaso.
abeojihago eomeoniga geudeulyi aiga badneun gyoyugyi beomjueseo meonjeo goreuneun gweonriga issneunda.
seumu ilgobjjae
saramdeuli modu jayuro sahoeyi munhwa saenghwale gaibhago, yesuleul hyangsuhago, gwahagyi jinbohago i jinboga mandeuleun bogjireul gongyuhaneun gweonriga issneunda.
sarami geuege mandeuleun modeun gwahag, munhag ddoneun yesuljagpumeuro isseun jeongsingwa jaeryoyi ijae bohoreul badneun gweonriga issneunda.
seumu yeodeolbjjae
saramdeuli modu han sahoeyihago gugjeyi jumuneul yoceonghaneun gweonriga issneunda. i jumuneseo, i seoneoneseo sseun modeun gweonrihago jayuga jeoncen silhyeoneul badgessda.
seumu ahobjjae
sahoeeseo isseumyeon saramyi gaeseongi jayuhago jeoncero gaebalhanda. ie, modeun saram sahoee yimuga issneunda.

sarami geuyi gweonrihago jayureul undonghaeumyeonseo, beobe hwagjeongbadanheumyeon, jehani eobsneunda. i sehaneul hwagjeonghan mogjeog ojig gita saramyi gweonrihago jayue pilyon seungingwa jonjungeul jumeul bojeunghami igo, minjun sahoeeseo dodeog, gonggong jilseohago bopyeonbogjiyi pilyohaneul jeogeunghami ida.
i gweonrideulgwa jayudeuleul haengsamyeonseo modeun sanghwangeseo ryeonhabgugyi mogjeoggwa weoncigeul wibanhaji mal ara.
seoreunjjae

i seoneonyi modeun jomuneun eoddeohan nara, jibdan ddoneun sarami i seoneoneseo sseun eoddeohan gweonrihago jayureul pagoehal hwaldong ddoneun haengdongeul haneun gweonriga isseumeul insuhameul seolmyeongbadji mal ara.
